nodes.text: Following Emperor Sheev Palpatine's proclamation of the New Order in 19 BBY, a new calendar was introduced with the day of the Galactic Empire's formation as its epoch. BFE stood for "Before the Formation of the Empire," and AFE for "After the Formation of the Empire."
Notable events expressed in the Imperial calendar
There were several dates recorded in this calendar:
Before the Formation of the Galactic Empire
After the Formation of the Empire
